description: Google searches for ‘quiet luxury’ spiked by 2,400 per cent to reach an all-time high in June. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Keeping it quiet: Say hello to the logo-less fashion trend dominating the runways and real life
title_page: Keeping it quiet: Say hello to the logo-less fashion trend dominating the runways and real life | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – It may be time to kiss those flashy logos and It bags goodbye.
In 2023, it is all about discreet accessories and beige sweaters that cost upwards of four digits.
